meanings.definition: A direct link from one website to another website.
meanings.sent1: I clicked on the hotlinks to visit different websites.
meanings.sent2: The article had many hotlinks to related sources.
meanings.sent3: The hotlinks on the page were like secret passages to new worlds.
meanings.sent4: Her website was a web of hotlinks connecting various topics.
meanings.sent5: The hotlinks made navigating the internet feel like a treasure hunt.

meanings.definition: A clickable link on a webpage that takes the user to another webpage.
meanings.sent1: The hotlinks on the page were easy to spot.
meanings.sent2: She followed the hotlinks to find more information.
meanings.sent3: The hotlinks seemed to have a mind of their own, leading me on a digital adventure.
meanings.sent4: The hotlinks acted as portals to different online realms.
meanings.sent5: Clicking on the hotlinks was like opening doors to new knowledge.

meanings.definition: To create a hyperlink on a webpage.
meanings.sent1: I learned how to hotlinks text in my webpage design class.
meanings.sent2: She hotlinks the images to various product pages.
meanings.sent3: He hotlinks with such precision, it's like digital embroidery.
meanings.sent4: Hotlinking is like building bridges between web pages.
meanings.sent5: The way she hotlinks makes the website easy to navigate.
